dcterms:creator: A. H. Abolmasoumi
H. R. Momeni
dcterms:description: This dataset includes simulations related to the robust observer-based H∞ control of a Markovian jump system with different delays and system modes.
dcterms:title: H2020 POSYTYF project

dcterms:creator: A. H. Abolmasoumi
H. R. Momeni
dcterms:description: This dataset consists of electromagnetic transient simulations used to validate the performance of control strategies in grid-connected systems.
dcterms:title: Electromagnetic Transient (EMT) simulations

dcterms:creator: B. Marinescu
O. Gomis-Bellmunt
F. Dörfler
H. Schulte
L. Sigrist
dcterms:description: This dataset describes the dynamic virtual power plant concept, integrating various renewable energy sources for grid stability and efficiency.
dcterms:title: Dynamic virtual power plant (DVPP)

dcterms:creator: A. H. Abolmasoumi
H. R. Momeni
dcterms:description: This dataset includes data from simulations of grid-connected DC-AC converters, focusing on their control and performance under various conditions.
dcterms:title: Grid-connected DC-AC converters

dcterms:creator: A. H. Abolmasoumi
H. R. Momeni
dcterms:description: This dataset pertains to the control of a grid-connected voltage-source inverter (VSI) using STATCOM techniques, focusing on performance during grid disturbances.
dcterms:title: STATCOM control of a grid-connected voltage-source inverter (VSI)
